page.title: 14THE DOVER JETFOIL
page.content:
The "Prinses Stephanie" and the "Princesse Clementine" are identical Jetfoils produced by "Boeing" aircraft engineering.It was in April 1975 that Boeing first made their Jetfoil operational.
They have a constant speed of 43 knots or 80km per hour,and even in rough weather,a high degree of stability can be achieved. The Jetfoils are very comfortable and fast.They do not pollute the environment either.
There are horizontal foils which are completely submerged while the hull is lifted clear of the water.The speed needed to lift the hull is reached after about two minutes.There are movable flaps on the back edge of the foils to ensure stability.These are guided automatically.
